content:
I'm happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have access to real-time weather forecasts or specific location-based information. I can suggest a few options to help you find out the weather forecast for your local park this weekend:

1. Check online weather websites: You can check websites like weather.com, accuweather.com, or wunderground.com for the latest weather forecast for your area. Simply enter your city or zip code, and you'll get the current weather conditions and forecast for the next few days.
2. Use a weather app: Download a weather app on your smartphone, such as Dark Sky or Weather Underground, which can provide you with real-time weather forecasts and updates for your location.
3. Tune into local news: Watch local news or check their website for weather forecasts and updates.
4. Check with the park authorities: You can also contact the local park authorities or check their website to see if they have any information about the weather forecast for this weekend.

Remember to check the forecast closer to Sunday to get the most up-to-date information. Have a great time playing tennis with your friends!
